use.flag: Enable support for updating IP address via CloudFlare
Install various example files, like for cron.
Use iproute2 instead of ifconfig to grab an IP address
Use sys-apps/iproute2 instead of sys-apps/net-tools for interaction.

pkgmetadata.longdescription: DDclient is a perl client used to update dynamic DNS entries for accounts on dynamic DNS network service providers. It has the capability to update more than just dynamic DNS and it can fetch WAN-IP-addresses in a few different ways.
